data.name: TOP DOG
data.detailed_description:
THE CORE

  • Dogfight against endless waves of enemies
  • Arcade cinematic action with a bit of simulation
  • Simple controls: Pitch + Yaw + Thrust + Strafe + Fire (hold for guns, tap for missiles)
  • FPS-like control scheme for Mouse & Keyboard
  • Gamepad & Stick support

THE LOOP

  • Rank-up and upgrade your aircraft mid-flight
  • Randomized waves and upgrade selection
  • Short runs and straight to action: no story, no cutscenes

THE CHALLENGE

  • Compete against other players on the daily leaderboards
  • Leaderboards reset every 36 hours

THE REQUIREMENTS

Minimum hardware requirements: all the footage here is taken from a 10 years old Intel¬Æ HD 4600.

DEVELOPMENT STATUS üöß

The game is at a good point: core mechanics are pretty much complete and development is mostly about content creation and polishing. If you like what you see please wishlist and if you want to get all the development news please hit the 'follow' button above! üôè
